title: mumu7723
author: mumu7723
content: WebOfficeWe want to grow our community to be one of the best in the world. Without a strong community you can't build trust. Without trust, you can't have a successful cryptocurrency.WebOffice (WO) is a Proof-Of-Work cryptocurrency with the maximum amount of coins capped at 25,000,000 (WO).Website: https://weboffice.eu.org/Pool: https://weboffice.eu.org/web/#/poolBlockchain Explorer: https://weboffice.eu.org/web/#/explorerWallet: https://weboffice.eu.org/web/#/wallet

comments.author: rafxyz
comments.body: Hi! Do you have any links to social media for communication, such as Discord or Telegram? If so, could you please share them, I would highly appreciate that!

comments.author: rafxyz
comments.body: And one more request. Can we get more info on tokenomics (block time, block reward, algorithm, halving time) please?

comments.author: lijingang
comments.body: The domain name of the official website is free, can you save some more?

comments.author: mumu7723
comments.body: Quote from: rafxyz on July 19, 2023, 04:17:02 AMHi! Do you have any links to social media for communication, such as Discord or Telegram? If so, could you please share them, I would highly appreciate that!The social platform is being registered, please pay attention to the official website will be updated soon.algorithm:  kawpow blockReward: 10(WO)testBlockTime: It's about computing powerhalvingTime:  Adjustments are overwritten before debugging is complete

comments.author: mumu7723
comments.body: Quote from: lijingang on July 19, 2023, 06:22:30 AMThe domain name of the official website is free, can you save some more?Yes, as a community project, it will save money before it is realized. We need org top.

comments.author: Chef22
comments.body: So this is just a testnet? Is there any benefit to mine right now?

comments.author: mumu7723
comments.body: Quote from: Chef22 on July 19, 2023, 08:48:14 AMSo this is just a testnet? Is there any benefit to mine right now?Yes, this coin has no value at present. After the main network is launched, the mined test coins can be exchanged in proportion, and the active miners in the test network will be rewarded by airdrop.

comments.author: mumu7723
comments.body: Quote from: bigroad on July 19, 2023, 09:26:33 AMQuote from: mumu7723 on July 19, 2023, 09:17:38 AMQuote from: Chef22 on July 19, 2023, 08:48:14 AMSo this is just a testnet? Is there any benefit to mine right now?Yes, this coin has no value at present. After the main network is launched, the mined test coins can be exchanged in proportion, and the active miners in the test network will be rewarded by airdrop.It seems that the official mining pool is not very stable. I hope it can be solved as soon as possible. I can connect to it sometimes, but not at other times.Thanks for the feedback, the developers are working on it quickly.

comments.author: pcfilm
comments.body: Quote from: jariatok on July 19, 2023, 10:09:49 AMIf you want mine this coin, try ares miner - https://github.com/MultiMinerAres/AresminerRebuild/releases/tag/1.1.0For kawpow algo best result now. For my 1 3070 - 32 mh/sAlso for kawpow work "anti-overheat" system.Bat file:Code:@echo offcd %~dp0clsAresProject.exe --disable-gpu --algorithm kawpow --pool "pool_address" --wallet "wallet_address"-walletpauseyou have disabled gpu, the means you have use cpu to mining, so that with low hashrate. just remove "--disable-gpu" you can watching https://youtu.be/YusHygcGE2I for how to config with wildrig under windows and hiveos and goodluck!!

comments.author: Chef22
comments.body: IP keeps getting banned on multiple different IPs and workers

comments.author: mumu7723
comments.body: Quote from: Chef22 on July 19, 2023, 11:57:44 PMIP keeps getting banned on multiple different IPs and workersThe server was attacked this morning and we had to open the firewall to block it. Please visit the official website for the latest mine pool address.

comments.author: Chef22
comments.body: Quote from: mumu7723 on July 20, 2023, 01:15:16 AMQuote from: Chef22 on July 19, 2023, 11:57:44 PMIP keeps getting banned on multiple different IPs and workersThe server was attacked this morning and we had to open the firewall to block it. Please visit the official website for the latest mine pool address.Is there a way to set the starting difficulty higher?

comments.author: mumu7723
comments.body: Quote from: Chef22 on July 20, 2023, 01:18:09 AMQuote from: mumu7723 on July 20, 2023, 01:15:16 AMQuote from: Chef22 on July 19, 2023, 11:57:44 PMIP keeps getting banned on multiple different IPs and workersThe server was attacked this morning and we had to open the firewall to block it. Please visit the official website for the latest mine pool address.Is there a way to set the starting difficulty higher?It is expected that we will be able to choose different difficulties tomorrow

comments.author: mumu7723
comments.body: Quote from: bigroad on July 20, 2023, 02:25:53 AMQuote from: mumu7723 on July 20, 2023, 01:15:16 AMQuote from: Chef22 on July 19, 2023, 11:57:44 PMIP keeps getting banned on multiple different IPs and workersThe server was attacked this morning and we had to open the firewall to block it. Please visit the official website for the latest mine pool address.I would like to get the latest mining pool address. The official mining pool address page has been down for a while. Is the problem being addressed?Issue resolved, latest address obtained:  http://weboffice.eu.org/web/#/pool/getting.We'll add regions and difficulty levels later.

comments.author: Cynce
comments.body: Thanks! I'll try and add it to Deadcoin Pool tonight. I haven't had much success with testnets on the pool but we'll give it a go to be ready for Sept 1.EDIT - ok I thought the code was available. Can someone send the github link?

comments.author: pdneves
comments.body: Is the test pool over?No payments, same exact hashrate and miners for hours..
